name: He Requires Apple
description:
This level was created for the Foundations of Creative Coding class at the University of Texas at Austin, taught by Tyler Coleman.

Music, SFX, and level design and construction done by me.

Assets used:

"Standard Assets" by Unity Technologies

"Free Small Low Poly" by B&J Studio

"Farland Skies - Cloudy Crown" by Borodar

"Mouse Knight PBR Polyart" by Dungeon Mason

"Nature Pack (Extended)" by Kenney

"Low Poly Survivor Essentials" by Broken Vector
